column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We frequent this place about once a month. We are huge fan of all things ramen and this place serves one of the best in town. The tonkatsu is a standing favorite. Their wait time is a problem
column2: generally long lines and difficult parking. Last time
column3: we were told to come back after 45 minutes
column4: and so we decided to sit down at the bar next door
column5: ordered our drinks and we were called after 15 minutes! Also
column6: a group of 5 people should get 3x2 tables put together
